section.name: Best Practice Software Engineering Podcast
section.p: We have recorded some enhanced podcasts with projects teams that used this webiste as the basis for their Projects at the Vienna University of Technology, specifically the BPSE-Basic Example.
Currently only in German, but English material might follow soon.

subsection.name: Enhanced Podcast?
subsection.p: An enhanced podcast is actually an audio recording with additional pictures and links. This is why the podcasts are provided in m4a format not mp3.

ul.li: Slides are recorded parallel to the audio, hence the slide presented to the text can be seen in parallel
Each Slide change is also a "chapter", i.e., slides can be easily skipped or specific parts addressed

subsection.p: This also means, that some Podcast recordings were not made in a studio-kind of setup, but live before audience

section.name: Get the Podcast
section.p: To get the Podcast, visit the Podcast Page. You find all Epsiodes there with "Shownotes". You can download episoded individually from there or better yet, subscribe to the Podcast feed.
